    | text      = Commission, which you could argue is an unelected position.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:47.519
    | text      = The various political parties field their candidates to hold the position and a vote

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:02.480

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}
